headline.main: South Africa's Zuma Picks First Woman to Head Top Appeal Court
headline.print_headline: South Africa's Zuma Picks First Woman to Head Top Appeal Court

lead_paragraph: South African President Jacob Zuma on Monday nominated Mandisa Maya to become the first woman president of the Supreme Court of Appeal, the nation's highest court on non-constitutional matters.
snippet: South African President Jacob Zuma on Monday nominated Mandisa Maya to become the first woman president of the Supreme Court of Appeal, the nation's highest court on non-constitutional matters....
